titles.ar: باب أَنَّ الصَّدَقَةَ فِي التَّمْرِ مَرَّةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
titles.en: Chapter 8 – The charity regarding the dates is for one time (only)

titles.ar: باب أَنَّ الصَّدَقَةَ فِي التَّمْرِ مَرَّةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
titles.en: Chapter 8 – The charity regarding the dates is for one time (only)

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ حَمَّادِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ حَرِيزٍ عَنْ زُرَارَةَ وَ عُبَيْدِ بْنِ زُرَارَةَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ أَيُّمَا رَجُلٍ كَانَ لَهُ حَرْثٌ أَوْ تَمْرَةٌ فَصَدَّقَهَا فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْهِ فِيهِ شَيْ‏ءٌ وَ إِنْ حَالَ عَلَيْهِ الْحَوْلُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا أَنْ يُحَوِّلَهُ مَالًا فَإِنْ فَعَلَ ذَلِكَ فَحَالَ عَلَيْهِ الْحَوْلُ عِنْدَهُ فَعَلَيْهِ أَنْ يُزَكِّيَهُ وَ إِلَّا فَلَا شَيْ‏ءَ عَلَيْهِ وَ إِنْ ثَبَتَ ذَلِكَ أَلْفَ عَامٍ إِذَا كَانَ بِعَيْنِهِ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْهِ فِيهِ صَدَقَةُ الْعُشْرِ فَإِذَا أَدَّاهَا مَرَّةً وَاحِدَةً فَلَا شَيْ‏ءَ عَلَيْهِ فِيهَا حَتَّى يُحَوِّلَهُ مَالًا وَ يَحُولَ عَلَيْهِ الْحَوْلُ وَ هُوَ عِنْدَهُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Hammad Bin Isa, from Hareyz, from Zurara and Ubeyd Bin Zurara, (It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said: ‘Whichever man who had a farm for him or dates, so he gives charity (Zakāt) of it, so there would be nothing upon him, and even if a year passes by over it, with it in his possession, except if he were to change it to wealth. So if he were to do that, and a year passes by over it being in his possession, then upon him would be that he purifies it (pay Zakāt), or else there would be nothing upon him, and even if it were to remain with him for a thousand years, when it was exactly it (in the same form). But rather, upon him with regards to it is the charity (Zakāt) of the one-tenth (10%). So when he pays it one time, so there would be nothing upon him with regards to it until he changes it to wealth, and the year passes by over it while it is in his possession’.
